mapper.select: SELECT CNSL_CD, C.STU_CD, C.PRO_CD, C.APP_CD, C.COMD_CD, CNSL_TITLE, CNSL_CON, CNSL_DT, S.STU_CD, S.DEP_CD, S.COMD_CD, STU_YEAR, STU_SEM, STU_MRC, STU_MOC, STU_CRC, STU_COC, STU_ADDT, STU_GRDT, P.PRO_CD, P.DEP_CD, ROOM_CD, PRO_JOIN, PRO_RET, PRO_POS, U.USER_CD, FILE_CD, USER_NM, USER_NME, USER_TEL, USER_ZIP, USER_ADDR1, USER_ADDR2, USER_REG1, USER_REG2, USER_MAIL, USER_PASS, USER_BANK, USER_DEPO, USER_ACC, U.COMD_CD, CD.COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM, COMD_DESC, A.APP_CD, A.USER_CD, A.COMD_CD, APP_TARGET, APP_YN, APP_REG, APP_PRODT, APP_RET, APP_PCD FROM COUNSEL C, STUDENT S, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, COMMON_DETAIL CD, APPROVAL A WHERE C.STU_CD = S.STU_CD AND C.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND C.COMD_CD = CD.COMD_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND C.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND C.STU_CD = #{userCd} ORDER BY CNSL_DT DESC

SELECT COUNSEL_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL

mapper.select: SELECT COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM, COMD_DESC FROM COMMON_DETAIL WHERE COM_CD='COLE'
SELECT DEP_CD, COL_CD, DEP_NM, COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM FROM DEPARTMENT,COMMON_DETAIL WHERE COMMON_DETAIL.COMD_CD=DEPARTMENT.COL_CD
SELECT PRO_CD, DEP_CD, ROOM_CD, USER_CD,USER_NM,USER_TEL FROM PROFESSOR,USERS WHERE PRO_CD=USER_CD

SELECT CNSL_CD, STU_CD, C.PRO_CD, APP_CD, C.COMD_CD, CNSL_TITLE, CNSL_CON, CNSL_DT, D.COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM, COMD_DESC, U.USER_CD, USER_NM FROM COUNSEL C,COMMON_DETAIL D,USERS U WHERE C.COMD_CD=D.COMD_CD AND C.PRO_CD=U.USER_CD AND CNSL_CD=#{cnslCd}

SELECT CNSL_CD, C.STU_CD, PRO_CD, C.APP_CD, C.COMD_CD, CNSL_TITLE, CNSL_CON, CNSL_DT, D.COMD_CD, COM_CD, COMD_NM, COMD_DESC, S.STU_CD, S.DEP_CD, S.COMD_CD, STU_YEAR, STU_SEM, U.USER_CD, FILE_CD, USER_NM, USER_NME, USER_TEL, U.COMD_CD, A.APP_CD, A.USER_CD, A.COMD_CD, APP_TARGET, APP_YN, APP_REG, P.DEP_CD, P.COL_CD, P.DEP_NM, P.COL_NM FROM COUNSEL C, COMMON_DETAIL D, STUDENT S, USERS U, APPROVAL A, DEPARTMENT P WHERE C.COMD_CD=D.COMD_CD AND C.STU_CD=S.STU_CD AND S.STU_CD=U.USER_CD AND C.APP_CD=A.APP_CD AND P.DEP_CD=S.DEP_CD AND PRO_CD=#{userCd} ORDER BY CNSL_DT DESC

SELECT CNSL_CD, C.STU_CD, C.PRO_CD, APP_CD, C.COMD_CD, CNSL_TITLE, CNSL_CON, CNSL_DT, S.STU_CD, S.DEP_CD, S.COMD_CD, STU_YEAR, STU_SEM, STU_MRC, STU_MOC, STU_CRC, STU_COC, STU_ADDT, STU_GRDT, P.PRO_CD, P.DEP_CD, ROOM_CD, PRO_JOIN, PRO_RET, PRO_POS, USER_CD, FILE_CD, USER_NM, USER_NME, USER_TEL, USER_ZIP, USER_ADDR1, USER_ADDR2, USER_REG1, USER_REG2, USER_MAIL, USER_PASS, USER_BANK, USER_DEPO, USER_ACC, U.COMD_CD FROM COUNSEL C, STUDENT S, PROFESSOR P, USERS U WHERE C.STU_CD = S.STU_CD AND C.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND C.STU_CD = U.USER_CD AND C.CNSL_CD = #{cnslCd}

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT CNSL_CD, STU_CD, PRO_CD, C.APP_CD, C.COMD_CD, CNSL_DT, USER_NM, A.APP_YN FROM COUNSEL C, USERS U, APPROVAL A WHERE C.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND C.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND STU_CD = #{stuCd} ORDER BY CNSL_DT DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= 6

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT CNSL_CD, STU_CD, PRO_CD, C.APP_CD, C.COMD_CD, CNSL_DT, USER_NM, A.APP_YN FROM COUNSEL C, USERS U, APPROVAL A WHERE C.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND C.STU_CD = U.USER_CD AND PRO_CD = #{userCd} ORDER BY CNSL_DT DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
